title: Thirty Years' War effect on Spain

content.prompt: Which of the following events marked the effective end of Spain’s ability to act as a champion of Catholicism in Europe?

choices.label: The Battle of Lepanto against the Ottoman Empire (1571)
The outcome of the Thirty Years’ War (1648)
The outcome of the Seven Years’ War (1763)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
